attributes.action: Disability/disabilities to have enshrined in law two parts of citizen status.
attributes.additional_details: References will hopefully follow.  I am a Registered Nurse for Learning Disabilities and have the Lady Heald Award (Nursing)
attributes.background: The change being that local and national government would be obliged to offer positive support based on Best Practice.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you mean by "enshrined in law two parts of citizen status". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
